name: Tofu Stir Fry
description: This tofu stir fry makes the perfect weeknight meal! It's vegan, super easy to make, packed with flavor and protein, and it comes together in just 30 minutes.

recipeInstructions.text: Cut the red bell pepper and the red onion into thin strips, the zucchini into half moons, and the carrots into slices. Cut off both ends of the green beans and cut them into halves. Finely chop the garlic and the ginger. Cut the broccoli into small florets.
recipeInstructions.name: Cut the red bell pepper and the red onion into thin strips, the zucchini into half moons, and the carrots into slices. Cut off both ends of the green beans and cut them into halves. Finely chop the garlic and the ginger. Cut the broccoli into small florets.

recipeInstructions.text: Cut the tofu into cubes. Add the soy sauce sauce, the sesame oil, and the paprika powder to the tofu cubes.
recipeInstructions.name: Cut the tofu into cubes. Add the soy sauce sauce, the sesame oil, and the paprika powder to the tofu cubes.

recipeInstructions.text: Stir carefully so all of the tofu cubes are covered in the marinade.
recipeInstructions.name: Stir carefully so all of the tofu cubes are covered in the marinade.

recipeInstructions.text: Add the corn starch to the tofu. It will help to make the tofu super crispy.
recipeInstructions.name: Add the corn starch to the tofu. It will help to make the tofu super crispy.

recipeInstructions.text: Stir carefully so all of the tofu cubes are covered. Heat some oil in a large pan.
recipeInstructions.name: Stir carefully so all of the tofu cubes are covered. Heat some oil in a large pan.

recipeInstructions.text: Cook the tofu for 6-8 minutes until golden and crispy. Stir every few minutes. Place into a bowl and set aside.
recipeInstructions.name: Cook the tofu for 6-8 minutes until golden and crispy. Stir every few minutes. Place into a bowl and set aside.

recipeInstructions.text: In the same pan heat some sesame oil and cook the onion for 2-3 minutes or until translucent.
recipeInstructions.name: In the same pan heat some sesame oil and cook the onion for 2-3 minutes or until translucent.

recipeInstructions.text: Add the garlic and the ginger and cook for another minute.
recipeInstructions.name: Add the garlic and the ginger and cook for another minute.

recipeInstructions.text: Add the vegetables and cook for 10-12 minutes.
recipeInstructions.name: Add the vegetables and cook for 10-12 minutes.

recipeInstructions.text: Make the sauce: Place all of the ingredients in a small bowl and stir well.
recipeInstructions.name: Make the sauce: Place all of the ingredients in a small bowl and stir well.

recipeInstructions.text: Add the sauce, the cooked tofu, the cashews, and the green onions to the stir fry and cook for another 2 minutes. Serve over brown rice.
recipeInstructions.name: Add the sauce, the cooked tofu, the cashews, and the green onions to the stir fry and cook for another 2 minutes. Serve over brown rice.
